name: Her Mark (ver.1.2)
description:
A bounty hunter falls for her mark in this cozy LGBTQ+ romcom fantasy adventure.

This is the improved version (after the jam's deadline). To play the original submission, click here.

Extra features in this version:

+ bug fixes (sounds not playing, sprites not showing, wrong dialogue by wrong characters)

+ navigation menu: ability to start the story from any chapter, to facilitate replayability.

+ restart button

---

Written by Cassie Soliday & Dom Parker
Art by Cassie Soliday
Music & Sound Design by Dom Parker
Programming by Giannis G. Georgiou

Created for InkJam 2022. 

---

You can play the game on your browser. Windows & Mac executable files coming soon...
